title: (x) Sans in Mini Cooper ads and brochures - Mini Headline {Jan E}
content:
Hey everyone...  
It's really urgent...  
can someone provide me with the name of the font Mini cooper uses?  
attached is the image  
THANXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX TYPOPHILES!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mini.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080508/http:/typophile.com/files/mini.jpg) | 62.48 KB |
author: metofa

comments.content: It’s a custom font called Mini Headline.
You could use Frutiger Bold instead.

\>It’s a custom font called Mini Headline.

By [Dalton Maag](http://web.archive.org/web/20140418080508/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/commissioning/case_studies/index.html)
